item.description:
Franklin Park Zoo, with its awesome new animal-themed playground, is not to be missed! This time let's go during the weekend so more of us can make it.

We can bring two adult guests. If there are others and you arrive between 10am-12pm, adults pay the child price ($11). Normally it's $17. Kids under 2 are free. Since Elsa is under 2, we can bring four child guests (ages 2-18). If you'd like to claim child spots, please do so in the comments.

The food at the concession stand is terrible, so pack a picnic! There are picnic tables and shady spots on the grass to enjoy lunch.
item.name: Let's Go to the Zoo! (this time on a weekend)
